articles.description: A total of 4,926,922 shares changed hands on the counter till 02:06PM (IST).
articles.content:
NEW DELHI: Shares of Company Ltd. traded 1.38 per cent down in Wednesday's trade at 02:06PM (IST). Around 4,926,922 shares changed hands on the counter.

articles.title: Tarsons Products sets IPO price band at Rs 635-662 per share - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: Tarsons Products IPO | At the upper end of the price band, the IPO is expected to fetch Rs 1,024 crore. The public issue will include a reservation of 60,000 equity shares for employees.
articles.content: Leading life sciences company Tarsons Products on November 10 said it has fixed a price band of Rs 635-662 a share for its Rs 1,024-crore initial share-sale. The three-day initial public offering (IP… [+1739 chars]
